jmines.control.listeners
Class MouseListenerForLinkLabel

java.lang.Object
  jmines.control.listeners.MouseListenerForLinkLabel
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, EventListener
public class MouseListenerForLinkLabel
extends Object
implements MouseListener

The mouse listener used for link labels.

Author:
Zleurtor

Constructor Detail

MouseListenerForLinkLabel

public MouseListenerForLinkLabel(JLabel newLinkLabel,
                                 String newAddress)
                          throws URISyntaxException
Construct a new mouse listener for the given label.

Parameters:
newLinkLabel - The linked label.
newAddress - The address this label is linked to.
Throws:
URISyntaxException - If the given address is not well formed Internet (or local) address.
